title: Will the Supreme Court make a final ruling on the Texas social media regulation case by July 2024?
body: This question will resolve as YES if the Supreme Court makes a final ruling on the Texas social media regulation case by July 31, 2024. The ruling must be definitive and reported by at least two reputable news organizations (e.g., BBC, The Guardian, New York Times, Washington Post). If no such ruling is made by the specified date, the question will resolve as NO.

article_information.article_description: The Supreme Court is keeping a hold on efforts in Texas and Florida to limit how Facebook, TikTok, X, YouTube and other social media platforms regulate content posted by their users. The court Monday returned the cases to lower courts in challenges to the law…

title: Will Meta Platforms be found in violation of the EU's digital competition rules by July 2024?
body: This question will resolve as Yes if, by July 31, 2024, Meta Platforms is officially found in violation of the European Union's digital competition rules. A violation must be confirmed by an official ruling or statement from the European Union's regulatory bodies. If no such ruling or statement is made by the resolution date, the question will resolve as No.

The changes must be officially announced by Meta Platforms and be directly linked to compliance with EU regulations. If no such changes are announced or implemented by the resolution date, the question will resolve as No.

title: Will Chicken Soup for the Soul Entertainment emerge from Chapter 11 bankruptcy by July 2024?
body: This question resolves as YES if Chicken Soup for the Soul Entertainment, the parent company of DVD rental operator Redbox, successfully emerges from Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection by July 31, 2024. Emergence from bankruptcy is defined as the company having its bankruptcy case closed by the court or having a reorganization plan approved and implemented. This resolution will be confirmed based on reports from reputable news organizations.

body: This question will resolve as YES if, by July 31, 2024, it is confirmed that a propane tank explosion in Izmir, Turkey, killed at least 5 people. Confirmation must come from at least two reputable news organizations. If the death toll is confirmed to be less than 5, this question will resolve as NO.

title: Will Boeing complete the acquisition of Spirit AeroSystems by July 2024?
body: This question will resolve as Yes if, by July 31, 2024, Boeing has completed the acquisition of Spirit AeroSystems. Completion is defined as the official and final transfer of ownership as reported by at least two reputable news organizations (e.g., BBC, The Guardian, New York Times, Washington Post). This question resolves as NO if the acquisition is not completed by the specified date.

title: Will the Supreme Court issue another ruling against a federal regulation by July 2024?
body: This question will resolve as YES if the Supreme Court issues another ruling against a federal regulation by July 31, 2024. A ruling against a federal regulation is defined as a decision where the Supreme Court sides against the enforcement or continuation of a federal regulation. The ruling must be reported by at least two reputable news organizations (e.g., BBC, The Guardian, New York Times, Washington Post). This question resolves as YES upon confirmation of such a ruling.
